translations: 潦草的笔迹；潦草的字条（或短信）

sentences.sentence: Her signature was an illegible scrawl.
I can't be expected to read this scrawl!
sentences.translation: 这种潦潦草草的东西我能看懂吗！

sentences.sentence: The letter was handwritten, in a hasty, barely decipherable scrawl.
sentences.translation: 这封信是手写的，字迹潦草，几乎无法辨认。
